reviewText: Excellent documentary. The global warming/climate change folks hate this doc because it sheds light on their duplicity. The History Channel doesnt have this for sale anymore ... I wonder why.

This is something everyone should see(also comes as a book, so reading would also be advisable).  The story is one of the possibility of human problems surviving significant climate change, so is pertinent to our present condition.  It is told in a very insightful and visually stunning manner.
